backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a message store with CRUD operations (send, edit, delete, get) for chat messages, storing them in a Map with auto-incrementing IDs and timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the React/TypeScript chat application components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with a grayscale palette and minimal color accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the alatele2 application with a root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing username state via session storage and conditionally rendering UsernameEntry or MessagingInterface with logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component displaying the alpha logo, app name, current username, and logout button with backdrop blur styling.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Textarea-based message input component with send button, supporting Enter to send and Shift+Enter for new lines, with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Message list component rendering chat messages with avatars, timestamps, and inline edit/delete functionality for the current user's messages.
frontend/src/components/MessagingInterfa: Main chat interface orchestrating Header, MessageList, MessageInput, and footer with auto-scroll and loading states using custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/UsernameEntry.ts: Username entry form with alpha logo branding in a centered card layout for users to join the chat without authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing the backend actor instance with Internet Identity integration, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Exports React Query hooks for message operations including fetching all messages with 2-second polling, sending messages, deleting messages, and editing messages with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including primary, secondary, destructive, and chart color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to conditionally merge Tailwind CSS class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component wrapped with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH values, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing 'alatele' messaging app with features for random username entry, message CRUD operations, Greek alpha symbol branding, and tracking of implemented and pending feature requests.
